desc: Join my eclectic remote coven! The members of The Thrifty Coven come from all backgrounds. We practice one spell — consisting of five items or less — two times per week. You can pick whichever session works with your schedule.

layout.text:
...with a community of supportive, like-minded witches.
The Thrifty Witch School is a global remote institution that teaches you how to perform weekly spells to empower you to live your best life.
